description:
The sporty and supportive Torsby GTX is ideal for anyone looking for a lightweight, functional shoe for outdoor activities. The mid-cut model makes the perfect companion for mountain hikes in lower ranges when you want comfortable and reliable footwear. By combining a sure-grip Hanwag Endurance Hike outsole with a waterproof, breathable GORE-TEX lining and a high-quality suede and nubuck leather upper, the Torsby GTX is the ideal solution for relaxing outdoor micro adventures.

In addition, the Torsby GTX is 100 per cent made in Europe, including all materials.

*** All Hanwag boots are sold under UK sizing - Please see size chart for details/conversion
name: HanWag Torsby GTX - Mens
